list.description:
CUSTOMIZABLE minimalist sight for all tanks with Violet Evergarden

How to Install:
1. Move UserSights.zip file into the War Thunder Home directory
2. Unarchive it there
3. choose rbAPDS_v5 Sight

NOTE:This sight is available for all tanks however only works best on sight with a magnification of 8x or greater. Even so gaijins wierdness doesn't guarantee that the sight will work on the tank you want so submit bug reports in comments and I will do my best to fix.

CUSTOMIZATION:
You can customize the text in the sight, to do so find the folder UserSigh...

Прицел для упреждения по истребителям и штурмовки в СБ

При пологом сбрасывание бомб на 400км/ч сброс на 400м по неподвижной цели

Буду рад если кто сможет сделать прицел лучше и точнее

This is the custom sight for the r3. its been giving me trouble when trying to re-add it so hopefully this works. Please inform me if it doesnt
#r3 #italy #sight

Remilia from Touhou Project Sight Green + Black

For all ground vehicles

In the file there are 2 .blk files one is green and the other is black. You can use both, or just use one.
If you have any feedback please level it down below! I do plan on making more, so I'm open to suggestions!

How to install:
1. Extract the files into /UserSights/all_tanks

#sight #anime #touhou #touhouproject #remilia_scarlet

Holo Sight Green + Black

For all ground vehicles

In the file there are 2 .blk files one is green and the other is black. You can use both, or just use one.
This is my first time making a sight so please leave feedback if you have any! I do plan on making more, so I'm open to suggestions!

Thank you @JojoTheWiseWolf as this sight is based off his here: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1001910/en/
Made following @Minedeployder tutorial here:https://live.warthunder.com/post/1000444/en/

How to install:
1. Extract the files into /UserSights/all_tanks

Fictional Type 90 Gunner Sight

Digital Gunner Sight for #Type90 & #Type90B
Crosshair White Light Always On

HSTVL Sight

Based from @TopTblga 's “Fero Z18” / “TZF-1A” sight for#HSTVL. Modified from the original to suit my taste

-White Light always on

A universal retro sight that rejects modern fashion.
There are two files in the pack for middle rank and modern vehicles.

#universal #stopanime

#sight #m48 #m48patton #m48a1 #m48_patton_iii #m48_patton #m_48
"Eye of the Storm" gunsight for the M48A1. I usually don't name my sights but from time to time I'll eventually do it
I, ooooh woooaaah
I, ooooh woooaaah
I, ooooh woooaaah
I...am the eye of storm!

Distance can be set for the whole shell sortiment (+coaxial MG) of the M48A1 except M313 smoke shell. Currently set distance is indicated by the arrows of the individual shells
Also, the radial "eye" lines running around the crosshair are, despite being a solely cosmetic feature, actual distance lines for the M332 APCR. ...

file.name: M48A1 Patton III Eye of the Storm Gunsight.zip

list.description:
-----English-----
Hello to everyone!

When I opened the T-80U tank, I looked for a sight. I found the sight below.
Sight: https://live.warthunder.com/post/900730/ru/
Creator: @CEMEH_054

But it was out of date and not all shells were available. So I got the update permission and here I am. Finally, I didn't add the 3OF26 ammo and 9M119, but I'm considering adding it.

The ammo type does not change by itself. You have to change it manually from settings.

Frankly, I like these kinds of sights, but their limitedness makes it sad. I hope Gaijin develops these sights in the fut...

Система управления огнём для Centurion mk5 avre era
Прицел на основе работ https://live.warthunder.com/user/zRirez/.
Множитель колеса мышки на 84%!!!!!!
Мой первый опыт в создании прицела. Дальность управления огнем только до 970м (просто рассчитывал все вручную, делать дальше не захотел).
#tank #centurion_mk5_avre #british

With a slight delay of 2 weeks, I finally got the willpower to learn how to upload a sight to war thunder live, so here it is, in all of its soy glory

Made for the BMP1 but works for the KV1 as well

This time Holo IS your crosshair!

#holo #spiceandwolf #anime #alltanks

//There are no horizontal range markings on this one so i recommend to use your rangefinder and sight distance control often.
//This should work fine for all tanks, but if the nose is off center there is a dot in the middle that you can use.

There are 3 .blk files in this zip. These are for different Zoom multipliers. One for roughly ~3x, one for ~8x and one for ~15x Zoom.
There are also 3 SKP files for these Zoom options if you want to make some changes.

How to install this sight:
1) In War Thunder choose yo...

bat-chat 25t

Simple sb sight for bat-chat 25t. Dots left from 100 is for 200,400,600 distances.

Panther D

Simple sb sight for Panther D. Dots left from 100 is for 200,400,600,800 distances.

Mudrock from Arknights, universal sight.
Original image, Sketchup file and installation manual is in the zip file.
(Screenshot shown is captured by a 1920x1080 screen, on smaller resolutions the crosshair may intersect with the horns, I'll try to make it compatible with smaller screens in the near future.)

#anime #arknights #mudrock #universal_sight
